message.raw:
Fixed bug that prevented transition to manual when no channels acquired.
Also changed acquire definition for labscript file calls. This should more in line with other devices.

Device and Channels are defined in connection table.
Individual channels to be acquired must call acquire() in script.
Device then must call acquire(t) to send trigger.
This allows for configurable channel acquires without changing the connection table.
